de.slothsoft.random.types.wordgen

Class DefaultWordGeneratorConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.slothsoft.random.types.wordgen.DefaultWordGeneratorConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WordGeneratorConfig

    public class DefaultWordGeneratorConfig
extends Object
implements WordGeneratorConfig
    Default implementation for the WordGeneratorConfig that you can fill using addLetters(Letter...) and removeLetters(Letter...).
    Since:
    2.1.0
    Author:
    Stef Schulz
